title: Bug 109718 - Put large content in text item, the tips show the content in one line
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN?? ?T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USER TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text item
Expected Result: tips show in the given format
Actual Result: tips show in one line
OB: When inserting a text in the layout and inputting 'Contents1. MINOR ENHANCEMENTS 32.1 PROVIDE PROPERTY GROUP INFORMATION ON ELEMETNDEFN CLASS 32.2 COMPLETE THE TODO TASKS 32.3 REVIEW RESULT 32.4 MESSAGE FILE ENHANCEMENT 4CURRENTLY WE STORE THE ERROR MESSAGE FOR EXCEPTIONS IN THE MESSAGE.PROPERTYFILE. NEW FEATURES 53.1 RHINO EXPRESSION PARSER 53.2 STRUCTURE TYPE SUPPORT 63.3 NEW SYSTEM 64. QA TEST SUPPORTING 7', the tips should be displayed in the given format.
EB: The tips should display the content in the given format, providing a clear and formatted representation of the large text content.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Insert a text in the layout with the following content:
   "Contents
   1. MINOR ENHANCEMENTS
      32.1 PROVIDE PROPERTY GROUP INFORMATION ON ELEMENT DEFN CLASS
      32.2 COMPLETE THE TODO TASKS
      32.3 REVIEW RESULT
      32.4 MESSAGE FILE ENHANCEMENT
   4. CURRENTLY, WE STORE THE ERROR MESSAGE FOR EXCEPTIONS IN THE MESSAGE.PROPERTY FILE.
   NEW FEATURES
      53.1 RHINO EXPRESSION PARSER
      53.2 STRUCTURE TYPE SUPPORT
      63.3 NEW SYSTEM
      64. QA TEST SUPPORTING
   7."
